entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Rain showers beginning late in the morning then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
